ext_description.p: A Blind_via is a type of . Each Blind_via is either a , a , or a . Blind_via is defined in IEC 60050-541.

example.p: Figure 1 illustrates an idealized cross-section of an interconnect substrate, showing the depth of penetration of a Blind_via into the substrate.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: A Bonded_conductive_base_blind_via is a type of in which the material that composes the base of the is conductive, and in which the base material has been implemented by conductively bonding the at the base of the Via to a of an adjacent conducting .
the words by which the Bonded_conductive_base_blind_via is known. It shall be equal to 'bonded conductive base blind via'.

specifies the that joins the on the interior facing surface of the that is one end of the extent of the to the or other on the interior facing surface of the immediately adjacent to the first . The surfaces identified need be adjacent only through the extent of the intersection of these two joined features.
The features_join shall be unique within a population of Bonded_conductive_base_blind_vias.

ext_description.p: A Buried_via is a type of . Buried_via is defined in IEC 60050-541.

example.p: Figure 2 illustrates a Buried_via in a cross-section view of an interconnect substrate.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the words by which the Buried_via is known. It shall be equal to 'buried via'.

ext_description.p: An Interfacial_connection is a type of that has both ends visible in the printed circuit board. Interfacial_connection is defined in IEC 60050-541.

example.p: Figure 3 illustrates an Interfacial_connection in a cross-section view of a substrate.

ext_descriptions.ext_description: the words by which the Interfacial_connection is known. It shall be equal to 'interfacial connection'.
A Non_conductive_base_blind_via is a type of with a floor whose material is non-conductive.
the words by which the Non_conductive_base_blind_via is known. It shall be equal to 'non conductive base blind via'.

A Plated_conductive_base_blind_via is a type of in which the material that composes the floor of the is conductive, and in which the floor material of the is contiguous with the material on the wall of the . The process that is to create this conductive contiguous material is electroplating or similar.
the words by which the Plated_conductive_base_blind_via is known. It shall be equal to 'plated conductive base blind via'.
